template.template: Template Net ARRIS SB6190 Cable Modem
template.name: Template Net ARRIS SB6190 Cable Modem
template.description:
Monitor an ARRIS SB6190/SB6183 SURFBoard Cable Modems
v1.0.1 - 2020-12-16
Maintainer: Rob McCready <rmccready@gmail.com> https://github.com/robmccready/zabbix-arris-sb6190

item.name: Modem Status
item.description: External check calling script to pull and parse the status web page from the modem. Result JSON stored in item and dependent items will parse JSON for appropriate values.

trigger.name: CABLE MODEM [{$MODEM_ADDRESS}] HIGH LATENCY
trigger.description: High response time from modem detected

trigger.name: CABLE MODEM [{$MODEM_ADDRESS}] HIGH LATENCY
trigger.description: High response time from modem detected

item.name: Ping
item.description: Ping the modem to determine if it is online
